div.p: A state that relates to the workflow or interpretation of this resource. Certain status values can modify the meaning of the resource, for example, entered-in-error. When a boolean value is used, Status of true indicates the record is active, false means inactive.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups
